title: A Pause in Eternity
description: Hitomi Tokugawa’s life has been one long, boring moment, and her passion for making it exciting has only made her covet novelty even more. She leaves her home island of Aogashima following Araki Mataemon, a legendary swordsman with a sworn oath to destroy Hitomi’s clan. Cunning, sexy, and absolutely lethal, Araki will drag Hitomi away from her unvarying existence and launch her into a new life within her eternity.A Pause in Eternity chronicles the unfading influence the people we meet have on our lives.
author: Rolando G. Candanosa
